item.title: FINDING MH370: New breakthrough could finally solve missing flight mystery | 60 Minutes Australia - 60 Minutes Australia
item.description:
Subscribe here: http://9Soci.al/chmP50wA97J Full Episodes: https://9now.app.link/uNP4qBkmN6 | Finding MH370 (2022)
Is the biggest aviation mystery of all time, the disappearance of Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, about to be solved? Yes, if you believe the man you're about to meet. Richard Godfrey is no crackpot; he's a respected British aerospace engineer and physicist who says he's found the doomed airliner. If he's right, he'll provide desperately needed answers for the families of the 239 passengers and crew who were aboard the Boeing triple-seven when it vanished eight years ago. But knowing where it is isn't the end of the story - Richard also has to convince authorities to resume the search that's already cost hundreds of millions of dollars.
WATCH more of 60 Minutes Australia: https://www.60minutes.com.au LIKE 60 Minutes Australia on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/60Minutes9 FOLLOW 60 Minutes Australia on Twitter: https://twitter.com/60Mins FOLLOW 60 Minutes Australia on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/60minutes9
For forty years, 60 Minutes have been telling Australians the world‚Äôs greatest stories. Tales that changed history, our nation and our lives. Reporters Liz Hayes, Tom Steinfort, Tara Brown, Liam Bartlett and Sarah Abo look past the headlines because there is always a bigger picture. Sundays are for 60 Minutes.
#60MinutesAustralia
item.itunes:subtitle: by 60 Minutes Australia published on Sunday, February 20 2022 at 10:45:48

item.title: How to become 37.78 times better at anything | Atomic Habits summary (by James Clear) - Escaping Ordinary (B.C Marx)
item.description:
Atomic Habits can help you improve every day, no matter what your goals are. As one of the world's leading experts on habit formation, James Clear reveals practical strategies that will help you form good habits, break bad ones, and master tiny behaviors that lead to big changes.
If you're having trouble changing your habits, the problem isn't you. Instead, the issue is with your system. There is a reason bad habits repeat themselves over and over again, it's not that you are not willing to change, but that you have the wrong system for changing.
‚ÄúYou do not rise to the level of your goals. You fall to the level of your systems‚Äù - James Clear
I‚Äôm a huge fan of this book, and as soon as I read it I knew it was going to make a big difference in my life, so I couldn‚Äôt wait to make a video on this book and share my ideas.
Here is a link to James Clear‚Äôs website, where I found he uploads a tonne of useful posts on motivation, habit formation and human psychology.
https://jamesclear.com/
If you liked this summary and you want to go deeper into Atomic Habits, here is a link to the book (Nothing Beats the book!)
üìïAtomic Habits by James Clear - https://amzn.to/2Yk6ulK
If you are more into Audiobooks, here is a link to that. You can get this audiobook for free if you sign up for a free Audible trial with the link below.
üéßGrab Atomic Habits audiobook on an Audible trial with 2 free books - https://amzn.to/3A5r32l
üóéIf you want to help out my channel, please consider grabbing the PDF mindmap and illustrations I made to go along with this summary - https://escapingordinary.gumroad.com/
Lessons you will learn from reading Atomic Habits ‚Ä¢ How to make time for new habits ; ‚Ä¢ How to overcome a lack of motivation and willpower; ‚Ä¢ How to design your environment to make success easier; ‚Ä¢ How to get back on track if your habits break down ‚Ä¢ How to overcome the plateau of latent potential
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ TIMESTAMPS ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ 00:00 Introduction 01:32 Atomic Habits 07:15 Law 1 - Make it Obvious 11:06 Law 2 - Make it Attractive 15:38 Law 3 - Make it Easy 18:13 Law 4 - Make it Satisfying 21:35 How I personally use this book
Here are some of the other summaries and non fiction book recommendations you can find on this channel
The Laws of Human Nature (Detailed Summary) -https://youtu.be/uhWzVdGmX2w
The 7 Habits of Highly Effective people (Detailed Summary) https://youtu.be/A-LJ6wvk7Cw
The Four Agreements (Detailed Summary) https://youtu.be/gpwuq5wOvwI
Limitless by Jim Kwik (Detailed Summary) https://youtu.be/naEkf_As9kU
Rich Dad Poor Dad | (Detailed Summary) https://youtu.be/eDa1U9qJKxo
Here is another good summary of this book by Ali Abdaal - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YT7tQzmGRLA
Thankyou for watching this animated summary of Atomic Habits. Please Subscribe :)
item.itunes:subtitle: by Escaping Ordinary (B.C Marx) published on Wednesday, October 6 2021 at 11:00:04

item.title: Before you waste another year of your life, watch this | Mel Robbins - Mel Robbins
item.description:
Learn the 5 ways to get UNSHAKEABLE CONFIDENCE in this FREE training from international bestselling author, Mel Robbins: https://bit.ly/3qKyaKt --- You‚Äôve spent a lifetime waking up and standing in front of a mirror.
And every time you look back at your reflection, you‚Äôre either picking yourself apart, critique yourself, or ignoring yourself.
It‚Äôs time to stop.
Before you waste another year beating yourself up and tearing yourself down - I want you to try high fiving your reflection instead of picking it apart.
When you start high fiving yourself, you start to build a partnership with yourself. You begin to start trusting yourself, cheering for yourself, and LOVING yourself.
You‚Äôre so good at supporting and cheering for other people in your life. It‚Äôs time to start giving that to yourself. ‚ù§Ô∏è
You can watch my full conversation with @Rich Roll on his podcast here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T6_RCZ54gy4
--- Subscribe to the channel here: https://www.youtube.com/melrobbins‚Äã?sub_confirmation=1 --- Get my #1 NEW book, The High 5 Habit, here: http://high5habit.com --- Follow me here: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/melrobbins/‚Äã Facebook: http://facebook.com/melrobbins‚Äã Website: http://melrobbins.com‚Äã Twitter: http://twitter.com/melrobbins‚Äã TikTok: http://vm.tiktok.com/ZMdVcc93n/ --- Sign up for my newsletter written to YOU at: https://melrobbins.com/newsletter/‚Äã --- Get three free guides + my Mindset Reset‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã program at https://melrobbins.com/mindsetreset/‚Äã

item.title: Jordan Peterson - How to Remember Everything You Read - Better Chapter
item.description:
One reason that many people don‚Äôt read much is that they don‚Äôt read well. For them, it is slow, hard work and they don‚Äôt remember as much as they should. Students, for example,may have to read something several times before they understand and remember what they read.
Why?....Jordan Peterson - How to Remember Everything You Read
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
üéì ABOUT JORDAN PETERSON :
This audio clip was taken and edited from Jordan B. Peterson. Jordan Peterson is a Canadian clinical psychologist and a professor of psychology at the University of Toronto.
Psychology professor Jordan Peterson has become a controversial figure ever since speaking out against Bill C-16 (2016), a law that adds gender expression and gender identity to the Canadian Human Rights Act.
He has received both praise and criticism after the publication of his self-help book 12 Rules for Life: An Antidote to Chaos (2018). His fans are thankful for the advice he‚Äôs given them to take responsibility for their lives. Peterson has become an important inspiration for various men‚Äôs groups, an influential voice.
Jordan Peterson gives an EXTREMELY POWERFUL motivational speech on becoming unstoppable in life, showing you the steps we need to take in order to achieve your true potential. If you enjoyed the wonderful life advice, be sure to support Jordan Peterson himself and purchase his latest book, it's a great read!
- ‚Äã- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
üîî JORDAN PETERSON BEST LECTURES Here are the most viewed Jordan Peterson 1hr Lectures Shortened into 4 Min videos https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZs8uXWHbVHikhI1mz3Qy5hoVWcAfdrWp
ü§Ø VIRAL VIDEO Watch Jordan Peterson Recent Trending Video (1 Million+ Views ) https://youtu.be/td0GqMp0CSE
ü§ñ MY FAVOURITE TOOL Discover my New secret weapon for making Ebooks in 60 SECONDS... It even writes the content for you https://bit.ly/INSTANT-EBOOKS
üëÄ WHO'S BEHIND THIS ACCOUNT ? Hi! I‚Äôm Ryan and I Animate Podcasts/Lectures about self-improvement, being a better person, and living a better life. My Greatest goal is to help you live your best life, If you need a friend like this Follow me on Twitter :https://twitter.com/betterchapter_
#Jordanpeterson #Improve

item.title: "Product is Hard" by Inspired Author Marty Cagan of SVPG at Lean Product Meetup - Dan Olsen
item.description:
Marty Cagan shares product management advice from his second edition of his book INSPIRED: How to Create Tech Products Customers Love and the all new second edition was just released at Lean Product Meetup on January 25, 2018
Marty Cagan is founder of the Silicon Valley Product Group. Before founding the Silicon Valley Product Group to pursue his interests in helping others create successful products through his writing, speaking, advising and coaching, Marty served as a product executive for some of the most successful companies in the world, including Hewlett-Packard, Netscape, and eBay.
If you haven't yet, check out Marty's great articles on product management (http://svpg.com/articles/).
If you would like to see more videos like this check out the followings talks from past months:
‚ñ∂ Dan Olsen's Product-Market Fit talk at Mind the Product SF 2018: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bDUrQlmwox4
‚ñ∂ Jake Knapp about his new book ‚ÄúMake Time‚Äù : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q4Sx9o85y-s
‚ñ∂ Box CEO Aaron Levie Interview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cJC_JuxRgIg
‚ñ∂ ‚ÄúBeyond Lean and Agile‚Äù by Marty Cagan: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7LYLhxb8Vwc
‚ñ∂ ‚ÄúJobs to Be Done‚Äù by Tony Ulwick: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qQFUHapOJsQ
‚ñ∂ Using Data to Set Your Product Strategy by Justin Bauer, who is the VP of Product at Amplitude: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H8XQVQy8Xiw
‚ñ∂ For upcoming videos like this, subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/DanOlsen
‚ñ∂ This video was produced by Coreography https://coreography.com.
‚ñ∂ Lean Product was founded by Dan Olsen https://dan-olsen.com.
‚ñ∂ Learn more about Lean Product Meetups at https://meetup.com/lean-product
#DanOlsen #LeanProductMeetup #ProductManagement
item.itunes:subtitle: by Dan Olsen published on Friday, February 23 2018 at 09:11:19

item.title: Harvard i-lab | Startup Secrets: Turning Products into Companies - Harvard Innovation Labs
item.description:
You've figured out your value prop, you've got a great product under development. Now what? How can you develop a roadmap to build a company? VCs often qualify deals as being a "feature" a "product" or a "company." Which do you have and how will you get where you want to go? During this session we'll discuss how to think about designing your product as a foundational element of your business. Think beyond UX and Architecture to Whole Product, Ecosystems, and Strategic partners. Formulate how to design your go to market strategy and business model into your product with a modular architecture, distinctive packaging and a frictionless approach.
Learn more about the Harvard Innovation Lab at http://i-lab.harvard.edu/ and follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/innovationlab and like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/harvardinnovationlab
item.itunes:subtitle: by Harvard Innovation Labs published on Wednesday, June 12 2013 at 03:41:35

item.title: Easy Way To Market Yourself and Why You Should Do It - Tell Your Story Part 1 - The Futur
item.description:
How to market yourself to your audience? How can you establish yourself as a thought leader but still makes people like you? What is the best marketing strategy that you can use in long term?
All of that can be answered in just one phrase: Tell your story. But how and why you should tell your story. In this first episode, Chris will show you why telling your story is one of the best way you can do to make people know you, like you and trust you
Want a deeper dive? Typography, Lettering, Sales & Marketing, Social Media and The Business of Design courses available here: https://thefutur.com/shop

item.title: Reinvent Yourself (2021)‚Äì Obstacles Are Opportunities In Disguise - The Futur
item.description:
How come some people are stuck and other are quick to change? How does someone get over obstacles? How do you bring all of your interests together to use as an advantage? How do you pivot?
In this talk from Graphika Manila 2021 you‚Äôll hear Chris tell his story of how we was able to go from graphic design, motion design, and everything in between to going on youtube and teaching millions. He also shares how you can overcome obstacles and use them to your advantage.
00:00 - Start 1:25 - Agenda 1:40 - Part 1: Refusal Of The Call 3:56 - Part 2: The Mentor Appears 5:20 - Part 3: Crossing The Threshold 6:03 - Part 4: Trials 8:25 - Part 5: Outcome 9:23 - 2 stories of how people used obstacles to their advantage 12:48 - The O.R.E.O. Formula 12:58 - Part 6: Conclusion 25:33 - Resources
Resources: The Innovator's Dilemma - https://amzn.to/3qAyV70 The Good Enough Revolution - https://www.wired.com/2009/08/ff-goodenough/ The Dip - https://amzn.to/3qA8cHD The Obstacle Is The Way by Ryan Holiday - https://amzn.to/2OjIE4p The Compound Effect by Darren Hardy - https://amzn.to/3coA1gK Goals by Zig Ziglar - https://amzn.to/3vcGLXH Atomic Habits* by James Clear - https://amzn.to/3etLA95 Grit* by Angela Duckworth - https://amzn.to/3etZhoG Power of Self Confidence by Brian Tracy - https://amzn.to/3coAdfY The Checklist Manifesto* by Atul Gawande - https://amzn.to/3bxFXVJ *Highly recommended by friends

item.title: Apple Steve Jobs Heres To The Crazy Ones - Nathan Hulls
item.description:
http://www.NathanHulls.com
Steve Jobs narrates the first of Apples 'Think Different' commercial "Here's to the Crazy Ones". It never aired. Richard Dreyfuss did the voice over for the original spot that aired.
"The ones who are crazy enough to think that they can change the world, are the ones who do"
http://www.nathanhulls.com

item.title: Entrevista completa: "El Bill Gates espa√±ol" #LaEstirpedelosLibres - Canal Iker Jim√©nez
item.description:
Jos√© Luis Dom√≠nguez¬†es probablemente el hombre que m√°s contribuy√≥ a la implantaci√≥n masiva de los ordenadores dom√©sticos en Espa√±a. Fue el fundador de la empresa¬†Indescomp¬†y el aut√©ntico introductor de la marca¬†Amstrad¬†en nuestro pa√≠s. A principios de los ochenta abandon√≥ su trabajo como agente de seguros con la intenci√≥n de vender microordenadores. Fue el fundador de Indescomp, una leyenda en la historia del software espa√±ol gracias a los juegos¬†'La pulga'¬†y¬†'Fred'.
Gracias al ordenador CPC 464 de la empresa Amstrad marc√≥ un hito en la historia de la inform√°tica casera espa√±ola. En Indescomp, a principios de los a√±os 80 y bajo su batuta, se juntaron algunos de los mejores desarrolladores espa√±oles. Casi todos los videojuegos que Indescomp desarroll√≥ para Amstrad CPC fueron publicados bajo el sello de Amsoft, una subsidiaria de Amstrad. Desde 1985 hasta 1989 Indescomp public√≥, bajo el nombre de Amstrad User, una revista dedicada exclusivamente a los usuarios de Amstrad en Espa√±a.
item.itunes:subtitle: by Canal Iker Jim√©nez published on Tuesday, June 8 2021 at 22:26:50

item.title: Doja Cat - "Say So" Live | MTV EMA 2020
item.description:
Doja Cat brings an incredible rock rendition of her hit track 'Say So' at the MTV EMA 2020 in London!
The 2020 MTV EMAs are hosted by Little Mix and feature performances from Jack Harlow, Alicia Keys, Tate McRae, DaBaby, Karol G, David Guetta, Sam Smith, Maluma, Doja Cat, YUNGBLUD, Zara Larsson, Little Mix, Madison Beer, Why Don't We, and 24kGoldn.

item.title: CS50 Lecture by Mark Zuckerberg - 7 December 2005
item.description:
On 7 December 2005, Mark Zuckerberg joined CS50 for a guest lecture about Facebook and computer science. With Professor Michael D. Smith. Shared with permission.
***
HOW TO SUBSCRIBE
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=cs50tv
HOW TO TAKE CS50
edX: https://cs50.edx.org/ Harvard Extension School: https://cs50.harvard.edu/extension Harvard Summer School: https://cs50.harvard.edu/summer OpenCourseWare: https://cs50.harvard.edu/x
